issues_reports.text: @repeat1968 @FrontierCorp They don’t listen.  I’ve been 7 days without service and they blame a fiber cut yet no one is on scene to work on the “fiber cut”. Then they tell me no known repair date.  Well not sure when I will pay my bill then
@FrontierCorp Too bad u dropped it right at the Holidays...

@AskFrontier speeds so slow I can barely even tweet! We’ve been having issues for over a month now with multiple service calls and tickets. We are getting 1/3rd of the speeds paid for. How can I get this resolved immediately?
@AskFrontier my service has been out all day with no updates or information. How is this acceptable?!

@FrontierCorp fiber was cut and now I don’t have any internet. This affects me with work and my channel. I got a ticket submitted, but there is a 5 day wait for this to be done. Is this the kind of service your customers are supposed to have? A long wait to fix the service?

@FrontierCorp @AskFrontier I would like to request someone dedicated to my account as we work on resolving my issue. This has been ongoing for weeks, tech support is now telling me that there is no problem without reviewing any information related to service requests.

@FrontierCorp 7 days with no internet in Parker city I hear reports that a line is down at a railroad crossing and you can’t get access I fail to understand how a company don’t have access to their own property

@AskFrontier what is the status of the service outage in central Florida?  I surely thought it’d be fixed by the time I came home from work- but NOPE! and I see no work being done in the neighborhood!  🤨😡

@FrontierCorp I've never experienced more issues in my life with an internet service. In a work from home world we are in. 2.6 down makes it impossible. 2 people working from home and hard wired, not on wifi. If there was ANY other internet service I would've switched long ago.
@AskFrontier @FrontierCorp day 7 in an internet outage with still no date of repair.  SMH.
@FrontierCorp I’m getting nearly identical speeds on a hardwired device. If someone from support were to review logs, you’d see that my account has similar issues over the last number of weeks.
@AskFrontier No internet. Rebooted router. No outage. Not sure what to do next?

@FrontierCorp Can I please take advantage of this or the gigabit offer as an existing customer? 

If I were a new customer I could get gig for what I’m paying for 500/500.  I shouldn’t be penalized for being a loyal paying customer for so many years now.

@FrontierCorp we have been without the internet since Saturday. I and my family members work from home. You guys have been replying that you’ve been working on fixing the fiber problem but no update yet. We all are working from another place right now for which we’re paying

@FrontierCorp I signed up for service yesterday. Your technicians are here today and they are on-time, knowledgeable, and professional. If your internet fiber service lives up to its promises, you’ve hit a home run.

@ShieldVoC can you believe @FrontierCorp has kept me a disabled former police officer and a veteran that depends on their service for medical monitoring without service or a service restoration date fir going in 8 days?  This is unacceptable

@AskFrontier I would love an explanation why the Internet has been completely down is completely down in Marietta California since early yesterday. Nothing from you.I would love an explanation why the service has been completely down in Marietta California since early Sunday.
@AskFrontier hi! Can you help me? I am 2 days without internet.
@FrontierCorp U advertise this, why as a customer of many years am I paying double that number
@BlueScaleGuild @FrontierCorp 7 day outage so far.   SMH.  I’ve had 2 tickets one for 12/6 no one showed. Now there’s one for 12/7 I guess we will see
@FrontierCorp Frontier upgraded their equipment and service in our area finally, after years of poor service. We’ve only had the new service for 3 days but so far much faster speeds and reliability

@FrontierCorp so like I said, it's complete garbage you won't allow current customers (and former tv subs for that matter) to just add a cablecard. that would get me exactly what I want, and it's clearly still possible because you allow existing tv subs to keep it.
@FrontierCorp I got the gig speed and it’s still terrible
@AskFrontier over 24 hours later and still no service.  It’s a good thing I don’t work from home this year! 😡 #nointernet #ipayforthis
@ShieldVoC can you believe @FrontierCorp  has kept me a disabled former police officer and veteran that depends on their service for medical monitoring out of service for going on 8 days??

@ChrisGilberts10 @FrontierCorp That’s typical for them.  I kept arguing how bad my service was months ago then finally the sent a new modem and then my phone filter wouldn’t work. Now I’ve been out of service since last Tuesday with no known repair date

@FrontierCorp Except it doesn't work. I have had horrible service since Frontier took over. They keep sending techs out to solve the problems nothing works. I am told by the techs on the phone one thing and when the techs arrive at my home they say not it. I pay for a service I don't get 😞
@FrontierCorp I have an internet outage in my area. When can I get the connection back? I need internet to work. Thanks.
@FrontierCorp it is a joke that you won't allow current customers to add tv services via cablecard. I don't want dish or streaming crap.
@FrontierCorp I need help with my internet

company_posts.name: Ask Frontier
company_posts.text: Hi 1Ksubswithoutvideo, I’m here to help with any of your questions and concerns. Please send me a direct message to gather the necessary information to better assist you. -Kevin

company_posts.name: Ask Frontier
company_posts.text: Hello, I would be more than happy to assist you. I would just need you to send me a private message. -Mary https://t.co/uvh7cLDQwy

company_posts.name: Ask Frontier
company_posts.text: Hi Nolan, I’m here to assist you with any questions and concerns about the service interruption in your area. Please feel free to send me a direct message so that I can take a look. -Kevin
